name: Luna Program
description:
The bug fix Luna Program.html is submitted 1 day after the deadline of Hexjam. It fixes an bug where a cosmonaut attempting to draw enemy fire away from an injured comrade will error out and the cosmonaut will do nothing. Also fixes an issue where cosmonauts are unable to patch other cosmonauts up.

Apply the patch by overwriting the Luna Program.html with the patched html. (Or put it in the same directory under a different name, doesn't matter) Compatible with existing saves.

If you have applied the patch, while voting, consider these bugs was not fixed in the original version.
